title: FS: T206 Hindu Powell Horizontal $135 Shipped
author: tinkertoeverstochance

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Hindu Powell Horizontal $135 Shipped
posts.post_content:
SGC 10 Powell Horizontal $135 shipped
SGC 20 Bell $SOLD

Currently taking offers on the T206 Hindu Powell (horizontal) SGC 10....not a bad looking card for a 10, especially since there aren't any creases through the player's face (but plenty elsewhere) and a very unobtrusive mark on the back (see scans). Make me a solid offer and the card will be yours!
Bump for the first time in 6 months.....trying to move this Powell Hindu, so bring a solid offer and you will own it!
Only one offer so far....don't be shy :)

Still taking offers on the Powell Hindu. Please email me at [url]mhenebry@purdue.edu[/url] if interested.

Thanks,
Lee

This Powell Hindu could be yours for $150 shipped! Email me if interested.

Thanks,
Lee
